Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BelowAverageComputer, Human, SmartComputer

    public interface Player
    Describes a class of human or computer to play nim

        int playerMove(int numTaken,
               Pile pile)
        Removes marbles from the pile
        Parameters:

        pile - the current pile amount for the current game of nim
